name: Feng Lin
bio: Feng Lin is an undergraduate student in the Department of Statistics & Operations Research at the University of North Carolina-Chapel Hill.

name: Arran Zeyu Wang
bio: Arran Zeyu Wang is a third-year PhD student in the Department of Computer Science at the University of North Carolina-Chapel Hill.

name: Md Dilshadur Rahman
bio: Md Dilshadur Rahman is a Computer Science PhD student at the Kahlert School of Computing at the University of Utah.

name: Danielle Albers Szafir
bio: Danielle Albers Szafir is an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of North Carolina-Chapel Hill.

name: Ghulam Jilani Quadri
bio: Ghulam Jilani Quadri is an Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Science at the University of Oklahoma. Previously, he was a Postdoc Fellow & Computing Innovation Fellow at UNC-Chapel Hill.
